description: A sales rep requests a concise post‑demo follow‑up email referencing specific product features; the assistant pulls CRM notes, generates a personalized email sequence, schedules the first email, and logs the sequence back to the CRM.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an agentic assistant that helps B2B sales teams create personalized outreach. You have access to tools for fetching LinkedIn profiles, company news, CRM history, generating email sequences, scheduling emails, and logging to the CRM.

I just finished a demo with Jane Doe at Acme Corp. We covered the real‑time analytics dashboard and the AI‑driven forecasting feature. I need a concise follow‑up email that references those features and sets up a next call next week.
Let me pull the latest CRM interaction notes for Jane Doe so I can incorporate the demo details into the email.

{"prospect_name": "Jane Doe", "prospect_role": "Director of Operations", "company_name": "Acme Corp", "last_interaction": "Demo on 2025-12-03 covering Real‑time Analytics Dashboard and AI‑driven Forecasting. Jane liked the customizable widgets, asked about ERP integration, and mentioned budget approval for FY2026.", "email": "jane.doe@acme.com"}
Great, I have the demo details. I’ll create a short two‑step email sequence that references the Real‑time Analytics Dashboard and AI‑driven Forecasting, and proposes a follow‑up call next week.
